name: Kurt Cobain by Jesse Frohman V2

metadata.name: Come As You Are
metadata.description:
Come as you are, as you were
As I want you to be
As a friend, as a friend
As an old enemy

Edition of 1

Come As You Are;
Multicolored quadryptich
The Last Session, Jesse Frohman ©1993, created 2021
